      • run

        public void run()
        Handles the messages coming from the stream (the server), de-serializing and calling callMethod. Creates and runs the thread responsible to send "pong" messages to the server, to notify the client aliveness.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(java.lang.String methodName,
                        java.lang.Object... arg)
        Delegate the sending of messages to the Messenger superclass, handling the socket output stream.
        Parameters:
        methodName - the name of the method to be called via reflection on the server.
        arg - the args of the target method.
